aka: Massive Engineering Mistakes(英·重新发行的标题)
trans_title: Massive Engineering Mistakes(英·重新发行的标题)
introduction: Humans have been building for more than 10,000 years - were engineering experts and yet every year, tales emerge of construction calamities from all over the world. From the extraordinary to the ridiculous, this series uncovers the epic fails and near misses engineers would rather not talk about.S2 E1 - Hell Tower NYCS2 E2 - Skyscraper vs. SinkholeS2 E3 - Nightmare on Main StreetS2 E4 - The Towering InfernoS2 E5 - Terror at Doomsday DamS2 E6 - Hellfire USAS2 E7 - Sins of Ghost VegasS2 E8 - Highway to HellS2 E9 - NASA Under PressureS2 E10 - Ghost Town from HellS2 E11 - When Demolitions Go WrongS2 E12 - Explosions from Hell
